mapper.select:
select i.id, i.express, express_no, i.price, cost, actual_weight, count, i.remark, t.volume, CONCAT_WS( '', province, city, area, address ) addr, ifnull((select discount from discount d where d.express=i.express and d.start_period <=DATEDIFF(now(),b.push_time) and (d.end_period > datediff(now(),b.push_time) or d.end_period=0) order by sort asc limit 1),100) dis from bill_item i inner join bill b on i.bill_id=b.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT sum( len * width * height * count ) AS volume, bill_item_id FROM bill_item_package GROUP BY bill_item_id ) AS t ON t.bill_item_id = i.id
where bill_id=#{billId}
